titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the St. James Episcopal Church records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Episcopal Church located at the corner of Brooklyn Ave. and Bagg Street, Detroit, Mich. (Street names have been changed to Brooklyn and Temple). The church was organized in 1869 and closed in 1910 by merger with Trinity Episcopal Church.
archdesc.scopecontent: Baptisms (1871-1880), marriages (1871-1880), confirmations (1872-1879), and burials (1871-1880); letterbook (1882-1885 with a few added items to 1890).
